alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 1:51PM CDT until August 09 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern McNairy County in west Tennessee... Southern Hardin County in west Tennessee... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 149 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Corinth, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corinth, Selmer, Iuka, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Burnsville, Glen, Walnut Grove, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Shiloh, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Stantonville, Doskie, Pebble Hill and Strickland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
